content: प्रचारः {@--1@} Going forth, ranging, walking about, wandering <ls>Ku. 3. 41.</ls> {@--2@} Appearance, coming in, manifestation; <ls>U. 1</ls>; <ls>Mu. 1.</ls> {@--3@} Currency, prevalence, use, being used or applied; विलोक्य तैरप्यधुना प्रचारं <ls>Trik.</ls> {@--4@} Conduct, behaviour. {@--5@} Custom, usage. {@--6@} A playground, place of exercise. {@--7@} A pasture-ground, pasturage, <ls>Y. 2. 166.</ls> {@--8@} A passage, path; <ls>Ms. 9. 219.</ls>
